relevant_findings.systolic_impulses: At the right parasternal border and second left intercostal space
relevant_findings.cardiac_auscultation: Persistently split S2, II/VI holosystolic murmur at the left lower sternal border, absence of S3
relevant_findings.lung_exam: Clear on auscultation without dullness on percussion
relevant_findings.abdominal_exam: Notable for a pulsatile liver without significant hepatosplenomegaly or ascites
relevant_findings.peripheral_exam: +2 symmetrical pulses, warm extremities, minimal varicosities without edema, clubbing, cyanosis, or venous stasis dermatopathy
